CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The high J SC value , along with a moderate fill factor ( FF ) of 45% and a high open - circuit voltage ( V OC ) of 0.79 V , yields a power conversion efficiency ( PCE ) of 4.12% , which is about 37% increase in PCE from a PCDTBT - based reference device.

Let's think step by step.

1. PCDTBT - this is the only material name mentioned in the paragraph. It is a type of organic semiconductor material, specifically poly[N-9'-heptadecanyl-2,7-carbazole-alt-5,5-(4',7'-di-2-thienyl-2',1',3'-benzothiadiazole)] used in organic solar cells.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.
1. PCDTBT - this is the only material name mentioned in the paragraph. It is a type of organic semiconductor material used in organic solar cells.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The high J SC value , along with a moderate fill factor ( FF ) of 45% and a high open - circuit voltage ( V OC ) of 0.79 V , yields a power conversion efficiency ( PCE ) of 4.12% , which is about 37% increase in PCE from a PCDTBT - based reference device.

Let's think step by step.

1. "high J SC value" - Here, "J SC" is the property name referring to short-circuit current density.
2. "moderate fill factor (FF)" - Here, "fill factor" is the property name.
3. "high open-circuit voltage (V OC)" - Here, "open-circuit voltage" is the property name.
4. "power conversion efficiency (PCE)" - Here, "power conversion efficiency" is the property name.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. "J SC" - short-circuit current density
2. "fill factor"
3. "open-circuit voltage"
4. "power conversion efficiency"

I have removed the irrelevant entities and kept only the material properties in the list.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| J SC |
| fill factor |
| open-circuit voltage |
| power conversion efficiency |

Here are the valid entities presented as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". The entities are presented precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
